items.content_html: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.

items.content_html: A lightweight multi-agent AI framework with modular extensibility, task collaboration, and LLM integration, designed for AI automation in Node.js and web environments.
items.title: codeacme17/orion-ai: A lightweight multi-agent AI framework with modular extensibility, task collaboration, and LLM integration, designed for AI automation in Node.js and web environments.

items.content_html: Save Your Clicks, Save Your Time! Online Click Saver is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension designed to reduce repetitive clicking and enhance your browsing experience. Whether you're filling out forms, navigating websites, or performing frequent online actions, this extension automates clicks and shortcuts to save you time and effort.
items.title: Kmkishore05/Lead-Tracker:  Save Your Clicks, Save Your Time!  Online Click Saver is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension designed to reduce repetitive clicking and enhance your browsing experience. Whether you're filling out forms, navigating websites, or performing frequent online actions, this extension automates clicks and shortcuts to save you time and effort.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js tool for optimizing, sorting, and merging CSS files by removing duplicate selectors, sorting CSS properties alphabetically, and preserving @media queries.

items.content_html: Fiverr X Reloader is a lightweight, React-based auto-refresh tool for Fiverr sellers. It keeps your Fiverr dashboard active 24/7 with randomized refresh intervals, a live countdown timer, and a sleek, mobile-optimized UI. Perfect for boosting online presence and productivity on Fiverr.
items.title: MuzamilChouhan/Fiverr-X-Reloader-Auto-Refresh-Tool-for-Fiverr-Sellers: Fiverr X Reloader is a lightweight, React-based auto-refresh tool for Fiverr sellers. It keeps your Fiverr dashboard active 24/7 with randomized refresh intervals, a live countdown timer, and a sleek, mobile-optimized UI. Perfect for boosting online presence and productivity on Fiverr.

items.content_html: 🚀 TicTask – A lightweight, open-source Pomodoro Timer & To-Do List Chrome extension with GitHub-style productivity analytics. Stay focused, track your progress, and share your streaks. Contribute & make productivity open for everyone!

items.content_html: Riona 🌸 is built using Node.js and TypeScript 🛠️, designed for seamless job execution 📸. It's lightweight, efficient, and still evolving 🚧—exciting new features coming soon! 🌟

items.content_html: Provides a lightweight MS Teams / Bot Framework UI to front a TotalAgility Automation Agent, proxying user interactions via Teams to the Agent running in TotalAgility, then displaying the Agent's responses.
